My daughter is looking for a non-Druid playbook that can talk too and is very good with animals. Any suggestions?
<div id='comment z13rwzkxxynbv15ll22bcjhwjzn1y3ca104'>

        <p>Hunter? But the Hunter dont talk with animals like druid. Just a simple comunication...</p>
</div>
